question_stem: A side effect of having a Husky as a pet is that when she sheds
choices: { "text": [ "the dog enjoys being washed out", "washing all the fur is easy", "it takes hours to vacuum all of the fur", "the fur is still attached to the skin" ], "label": [ "A", "B", "C", "D" ] }
cot: Let's think step by step. We need to find what the problem is when a Husky sheds. The dog may or may not enjoy being washed out, this does not seem to be a consistent side effect of when the dog sheds. A Husky is a dog with a lot of fur. So it can' t be easy to wash it all. It is true that it would take a long time to vacuum all of the fur. Fur still attached to the skin may happen, but it is not a direct side effect of when the dog sheds, but somethinf that may happen.

question_stem: Freezing point is best represented by
cot: Freezing point is best represented by ice, since all other options represent the liquid state of water, whereas ice sculpture represents the solid state of water which is indeed ice.
